description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Micromazes is an 8-bit retro style puzzle game which can be played single player or two-player co-op (challenge mode), or two-, three- or four-player versus (race mode). Levels are randomly generated so no two games are ever the same. To complete the 50 challenge levels you'll have to make use of keys, doors, blocks, targets, teleports, switches and lots lots more!
